Translations.Text: avanu satyavannu samarthisalilla mattu namajhannu sallisalilla
mattu hem'meyinda bigutta tanna maneyavara balige horatanu
manusyanenu, tannannu higeye bittu bidalaguvudendu kondiddaneye
avanenu, kevala harisi bidalada ondu hani viryavagiralillave
taruvaya avanu rakta pindavadanu. A balika avanu (allahanu) avanannu srstisidanu mattu rupisidanu
